hero.title: ELITE RESIDENCE
hero.paragraph: See how a 5-stories tower's being built, in a short time!

about.title: OUR HISTORY
about.header: OUR CONSTRUCTION COMPANY HAS BEEN FOUNDED 10 YEARS AGO, AT THE VERY PEAK OF THE BUILDING FRENZY IN THE GEORGIA...
about.paragraph: Since then we've built hundreds of commercial, government and private buildings and facilities. It may not sound like a lot, but if you estimate the manpower, working hours, materials, planning and correlating that were all involved in completing each separate project, then our productivity is immense!
